name: Perseus Dark Region KC-V C2-2
infos: The Hesperus a Lowell class megaship owned by Azimuth Biochemicals. It is the sister ship of the Adamastor alongside a dredger from the Scriveners Clan which is claiming to own to salvage rights on the Hesperus.

name: Taurus Dark Region UY-R B4-0
infos: Listening Post with the nickname "H1" found inside an Asteroid Belt through the Listening Post inside Adamastor (Chukchan).

name: Perseus Dark Region LN-K B8-0
infos: Listening Post with the nickname "H2" found inside an Asteroid Belt through decyphering of H1.

name: California Sector IH-V C2-1
infos: Listening Post with the nickname "H3" found through decyphering of H1.

name: Li Chul
infos: According to Salvation: Li Chul is the Hesperus starting system - Hesperus 17 Listening Post Challenge begins here.
